title: urugik-karai
sahitya:
urugik-karai manamE murugan tiru nAmam Odi


anupallavi

  varaiyillA aruLai vazhangi varum avan kurai unadu ellAm maraiyak-krpai kUra nI


caraNam    ODi ODi alaindum OyAmal tirindum nADiya nalamEdum kai kUDAda pOdum
vADi sOrvurAdu nalla vAzhvinait-tEDip-pera sADumun vazhakkattai shaTru vilakki viTTu
